thread.title: Extremely Disappointed in Va
thread.title_full: Inkfarm.com reviewed by Extremely Disappointed in Va

author: Extremely Disappointed in Va
title: Extremely Disappointed in Va
text: We purchased a recycled cartridge for our HP printer. When we receive ever it it was defective and they promised to send another immediately. A week later when we called we were told that it never was sent. Completely unacceptable.
